Title: Die Hard 4.0
Writer: John Carlin (based upon the article "A Farewell to Arms" by), Roderick Thorp (certain original character by), Mark Bomback (story by), David Marconi (story by), Mark Bomback (screenplay by)
Actors: Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long, Maggie Q
Plot: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.
